EmailTemplate.name: NorthAm_Event_Lean Startup Conference_Q415.Invited Dinner
EmailTemplate.subject: Join Pivotal for Dinner in San Francisco on November 18th
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Network with fellow startup entrepreneurs, accelerators, and VCs over drinks and dinner while you learn about Pivotal’s approach to building great software. Jason Fraser, Director of the Innovation Practice at Pivotal Labs, will describe how Pivotal uses agile methodologies and lean practices to help innovate and transform business through software. Following Jason’s presentation, a panel of startup founders will discuss their own experiences with the Pivotal approach.
Join us:
Date: November 18, 2015 Time: 7:00 PM - 9:30 PM Location: Pivotal <http://pivotal.io/locations/sanfrancisco>, 875 Howard Street, 5th Floor San Francisco, CA 94103
Please RSVP <http://pivotal.io/event/vip-dinner> by November 13th.
Questions? Please contact us via email <mailto:pivotal-operations@pivotal.io> or visit our website <http://pivotal.io>.
We look forward to seeing you, The Pivotal Team
